title: Emerald Blossom Jhumkas - Panache Collection
materials: 22K Gold (916 Hallmark) with Hyderabadi Polish; Pear-shaped Emerald centerpiece (estimated 1 carat each)
features: Inspired by traditional South Indian floral motifs with a modern twist. Features a central pear-shaped Emerald, surrounded by a halo of sparkling diamonds. The intricate filigree work in gold enhances the design's delicateness. Features a multi-tiered structure for added depth and dimension. Secure screw-back closure ensures comfortable and secure wear.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to exude sophistication. Perfect for modern and traditional outfits
and evening gowns. Makes a thoughtful gift for birthdays
description: The blend of traditional craftsmanship with contemporary design makes these jhumkas a unique and versatile addition to your jewelry collection. The Hyderabadi Polish gives the gold a rich, enduring shine. The Emerald symbolizes prosperity and new beginnings, while the diamonds signify purity and eternal love. Excellent craftsmanship assures durability and longevity.
